text: is a Japanese city in Kanagawa Prefecture on the island of Honshū.Nussbaum, Louis-Frédéric. (2005). "Hakone" in Japan Encyclopedia, p. 279. ==History== In the Edo period, Hakone-juku was 10th of the 53 shogunate-maintained waystations (shuku-eki) along the Tōkaidō road which connected Edo and Kyoto.Nussbaum, "Tōkaidō" at p. 973. ==Related pages== * The Fifty-three Stations of the Tōkaidō ==References== == Other websites == * http://www.kanagawa-kankou.or.jp/english/area/hakone.html , http://www.kanagawa-kankou.or.jp/index.html Category:Cities in Kanagawa Prefecture
title: Hakone, Kanagawa
